Detailed Description

Implementation of imath::IDoubleManip interface for fixed point arithmentic.

enum imath::CFixedPointManip::RoundingType

Enumerator:
RT_NORMAL  Normal mathematical rounding to the nearest value.
RT_FLOOR  Rounding down.
RT_CEIL  Rounding up.
